itemDesc: A blood component used to treat wounded soldiers on the battlefield.
Supplies for maintaining structures. Store at bases to prevent decay on surrounding bunker/trench structures when garrison supplies are not available.
Used by medics to heal other soldiers.
Supplies for maintaining structures. Store at bases to prevent decay on surrounding structures.
A standard issue set of supplies for foot soldiers. Bases must be stockpiled with soldier supplies in order for players to spawn.
Used by medics to revive wounded soldiers.
